data.name: Linaro Virtual Connect 2020
data.description: Every six months, over 300 of the world’s leading open source engineers working on Arm get together for a full week of engineering sessions and hacking at Linaro Connect.

relatedRecords.name: Monkey Fest USA 2020
relatedRecords.description:
MonkeyFestUSA is a brand-new Developers conference focused on covering all aspects of Cross-platform mobile development within the .NET ecosystem.
We will be covering topics like Testing, Automation, Reactive Programming, UI/UX, Maui, Xamarin.Forms, and other related topics.
